metadata.name: Delete Important Scheduled Task
metadata.comment: Detects when adversaries stop services or processes by deleting their respective scheduled tasks in order to conduct data destructive activities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/delete')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tn')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\bitlocker')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\exploitguard')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\systemrestore\\sr')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\updateorchestrator\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\windows defender\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\windowsbackup\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\windowsupdate\\'))))

output.summary: Detects when adversaries stop services or processes by deleting their respective scheduled tasks in order to conduct data destructive activities

metadata.objective: False positive: Unlikely Reference: Internal Research
